sentences.en: All of that is grist for the mill for the Russian media, which is popular in the east of the country and uses every opportunity to decry "fascism" in Ukraine.
sentences.cn: 所有这些都像谷物被放进研磨机中一样，被俄国媒体粉碎，后者在这个国家的东部地区广受欢迎，并利用一切机会谴责乌克兰国内的“法西斯主义”。

sentences.en: He is impatient with those who decry the scheme.
sentences.cn: 对于那些反对该方案的人，他表现得很不耐烦。

sentences.en: Human rights monitors decry the imprisonment of a Qatari poet, Mohammed al-'Ajami, for spreading verse deemed seditious and insulting to the emir.
sentences.cn: “人权监督”谴责卡特尔因为其诗人默罕默德·阿加米散布据信对现任埃米尔有煽动性和攻击性的诗句而监禁他。

sentences.en: I know ‘tis the season to decry all things materialistic, but just as we’re inspired by people we are also inspired by things.
sentences.cn: 我想这是谴责所有事情物质化的时候了，然而正如我们被人所激励一样，我们也受事物的激励。

sentences.en: It may be tempting for some to decry incentives as nothing but a poisonous fruit of Con-Lib responsibility thinking.
sentences.cn: 对一些人谴责激励机制只是作为“新政治”责任思考的毒果这样的结论本身是很冒险的。

sentences.en: Many people decry flogging ( or caning ).
sentences.cn: 许多人反对鞭打或棒打.

sentences.en: On , no need to decry your industry!
sentences.cn: 得了,您很勤快, 不必谦虚了!

sentences.en: They rightly decry the unhealthily close ties of some European politicians to their counterparts in Russia.
sentences.cn: 他们谴责了一些欧洲和俄罗斯政客之间过分亲密的关系。

trans.tran_en: to state publicly that you do not approve of something
